item.title: No title
item.description: Over the last several years, we have seen financial technology disrupt the traditional banking model and help start bringing finance into the 21st century. Our generation has transitioned into a lifestyle in which mobile applications and social media have come together to make everyday activities (i.e. shopping (Amazon), transportation (Uber / Lyft), delivery (Grubhub), dating (Tinder), etc.) seamless and easily accessible. Yet, why is it that finance--particularly the mobile credit market--is non-existant?
